#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    string s;
    char ret[1000];
    int i,len,j=0;
    getline(cin,s);
    len=s.length();
    for(i=0;i<len;i++)
     {
      ret[j++]=s[i];
      if(s[i]=='a' || s[i]=='e' || s[i]=='i' || s[i]=='o' || s[i]=='u')
       i+=2;
     }
     ret[j]='\0';
    printf("%s\n",ret);
    return 0;
}
